attributes.action: look at maternity intensive care services
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Within the various WHO programmes, the Safe Motherhood programme has been described by one prominent midwife as,

"Right at the bottom of the pack",

Within maternity services, post natal care, has been described as "the Cinderella of services".

Thus, in keeping with the manifesto commitment to improving public sector services, the petitioner is calling on the P.M. to ensure every intensive care has a trained midwife and construct an audit of the knowledge - skills base amongst NHS staff, of high risk diagnoses and their management.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
